events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it because it's the wrong size and I would like a full refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item size received by the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong size item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and receive a refund due to the wrong size.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a clear photo showing the size label on the package.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once the returned item has been received by our warehouse.
Thanks for the update. I will send the item back today using the prepaid label you provide.
We have received your returned item and your refund has been processed. You should see the money back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been credited. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case as your refund was successfully processed and you confirmed receipt. Thank you for contacting customer support.
